Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Dragonwort Castle
Reviews.Content: Excellent extension for the Boresnake inspection camera - read my review there or:Works great and is easy to set-up.  I used it for inspecting travel trailer air-conditioner ducting for mice sign; and I found their entrance. The one thing to be aware of is the image is upside down when mounted on the "gun" and if you turn the gun the image stays upside down as the camera rotates. But, the monitor is also wireless and easily detachable, so just turn it around.  The image is auto focus and very sharp and clear; HD it seems. The flexible camera snake is stiff, which is good for running it into walls or ducts, but is also flexible and can go around corners with some help; one can bend the tip to the side to inspect an area, or use the included tip-mounted mirror.  The mirror works but the image is not a clear as without the mirror.  The device also comes with a magnet, and a wire retreiver for pulling wires.  I recommend getting the extension and the nice case has a space for it. The camera is only in the tip, so the snake and extension are keyed and wired to fit together; it is not fiber-optic. It is very handy and anyone can use it. I highly recommend it for inspection of any hidden problem.

Reviews.Title: extension for borescope
Reviews.Author: George H. Smith
Reviews.Content: Excellent product.  Easy to attach to main pipe.  It really makes the borescope ideal and give you enough length to do most things a homeowner would need to do.  My first use was to inspect a seal that was leaking on an RV dump valve.

Reviews.Title: works !
Reviews.Author: Klem
Reviews.Content: This is a nice attachement for the scope. It gives you the extra lengh you need sometimes. Note that both this cable and the one that's connected to the scope are stiff by design and take some practice to use correctly.Make sure you screw the connections tight or things can come off.

Reviews.Title: Borescope extension
Reviews.Author: David Hauke
Reviews.Content: I was glad to get this as the original equipment scope was a bit short for some applications.  The only difficulty is that it is a mite stiff and doesn't go around corners very well.

Reviews.Title: Good quality and very useful !
Reviews.Author: Roger "Webshopper"
Reviews.Content: Not much to comment. It is a good quality item and useful if you need to extend the length of the following tool:2GB Wireless Waterproof Snake Recordabl Plumbing Sewer Inspection Camera with 3.5 TFT-LCD palm Color removeable LCD Monitor - Borescope Endoscope "

Reviews.Title: well....
Reviews.Author: Elias Lolos
Reviews.Content: I expected it to be thinner like the one that comes with the camera....hard to bend like cheaper cameras but still gives a longer reach if you are going to stick it down the drain...Oh well, won't be first time I wasted money and maybe not the last..

Reviews.Title: A really fine product.
Reviews.Author: Geneva Kehm
Reviews.Content: So happy with this.  I've used it now several times and it really has been a great help in my trouble-shooting.
